law.text: At any time prior to a child's twenty-first birthday, the cabinet may institute a legal action against an obligor for the reimbursement of money paid by the cabinet for the benefit of the child through the public assistance programs.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 411, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 16.
